issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add support for repartitioning
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4816](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4816). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It should be possible to repartition as part of the logical plan.

Use cases:
 \* Repartition a single file into multiple partitions for parallel query execution
 \* Collapse to a single partition at the end of query execution

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4816?focusedCommentId=17066720) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
I am closing this because I feel that it is beyond the scope of Arrow/DataFusion. DataFusion already supports parallel query execution across partitioned files and users of DataFusion can choose how they want to partition their files.
